```{r}
library(prepdat)
library(tidyverse)
data <- file_merge(folder_path="./",
                   has_header=TRUE,
                   raw_file_name = "mazesolving-",
                   raw_file_extension="csv",
                   notification = TRUE)

data %>% select(subnum:totaltime) %>% group_by(maze) %>% summarize(moves=mean(totalmoves-shortestpath),plan=mean(planningtime),sol=mean(solutiontime)) |>
  arrange(moves)
```
